extendedInfo.description: DV Hotties are now on Android! There are over 10k sexy girls for your viewing pleasure and this number increases regularly! You are notified when new girls are added.The following features are available to this app:- Notifications: You are notified when there are new girls available. You may also choose to disable this option under Settings.- Share: You can share all of your favorite girls through numerous android apps, such as Email/Facebook etc.- Titles: All girls have a funny and entertaining title to go with their picture- Favorites: You can favorite the girls and view them at a later time. These favorites can also be saved to your SD Card- Privacy: If you want to change the application name and icon to hide it from others, there is a setting to do so- Wallpaper: Set the girls as your wallpaper- Albums: There are over 60 albums to choose from- History: This feature allows you to go through recently viewed picturesPlease be advised that this app is for mature audiences only. There is no nudity, but some images may be sexual in nature.Some keywords: Hot, cute, sexy, pretty, girls, women, chicks, erotic, amateur, cleavage, bikini, blonde, brunette, beach girlsThis application is free and ad-supported. Enjoy!
